## ContextSubscriptionManager.unsubscribe() method

Remove the context event observer from the context

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unsubscribe(observer: ContextEventObserver): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  observer | <code>ContextEventObserver</code> | Context event observer |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
